---
title: "Assignments"
---

You have three types of assignments in this course

## Labs


- Each Thursday we will work in groups to complete an in-class lab

- The labs are designed to reinforce and extend concepts from lecture using real world data.

## Tutorials

Coding tutorials to reinforce concepts from lecture and textbook.

Accessed by running in the console of R Studio

```{r}
#| eval = F
learnr::run_tutorial("00-intro", package = "qsslearnr")
```

Complete the tutorial. Save output as "LASTNAME_TutorialNumber.html"

Upload output to Canvas by Friday by 11:59 pm


## Final Project

Finally, throughout the semester you will be have periodic assignments to ensure that you're making progress on your final projects.

- **Week 4: ** [Research Topics](a1.qmd)
- **Week 6: ** [Potential Data](a2.qmd)
- **Week 8: ** [Explortatory Analysis](a3.qmd)
- **Week 11:**  [Draft](a4.qmd)
- **Week 12:**  [Presentations](a5.qmd)
- **Week 13:**  [Final Paper](final.qmd)
